mapper.select: SELECT article_id articleId, title, author, summary, content FROM article_info WHERE article_id = #{articleId} AND state=0
SELECT article_id articleId, title, author, summary, content FROM article_info WHERE catalog_id = #{calalogId} AND state=0 ORDER BY article_id ASC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO article_info( article_id, title, author, summary, content, catalog_id, state, create_time ) VALUES ( #{articleId}, #{title}, #{author}, #{summary}, #{content}, #{catalogId}, 0, now() )
mapper.update: UPDATE article_info a SET a.state = 1 WHERE a.article_id = #{articleId}
